page.title: 17Religion, Hopton Church.
page.content: This is called the Parish church of St. Margaret & church the vicars name is Christopher R. Chapman. This church was rebuilt after the old one was burnt in 1856. When the thatched roof caught fire in a storm. The new roof is made out of slates. There is a tower, it is tall, but it has no bells, as they corode with the sea soil. Also the tower is not strong enough to support them. The service times are:- 8.30 every Sunday = Holy Communion 11.00am each Sunday as follows: 1st, 3rd & 5th. Sung parish communion 2nd Sunday in month. There is poor attendance at the services. The church is small but is very pleasant to visit.
